en.title: [Jun 2025] Labour Force
en.description: Monthly labour force report, covering statistics on unemployment, employment, and labour force participation.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest monthly Labour Force Survey report, covering statistics on unemployment, employment, and labour force participation.

bm.title: [Jun 2025] Tenaga Buruh
bm.description: Laporan tenaga buruh bulanan, merangkumi statistik pengangguran, penduduk bekerja, dan penyertaan tenaga buruh.
bm.description_email: DOSM telah menerbitkan laporan Survei Tenaga Buruh bulanan terkini, merangkumi statistik pengangguran, penduduk bekerja, dan penyertaan tenaga buruh.
